abstracts.cdata!:
The project would consist of the
            following: (a) reinforcement of the 49 km Logone dike and
            improvement of a parallel road; (b) construction of four
            pumping stations; (c) rehabilitation of irrigation and
            drainage networks to serve 1,300 ha; (d) construction of new
            irrigation and drainage networks to serve 3,000 ha; (e)
            on-farm development works on 3,000 ha; and (f) construction
            of a rice mill with an annual capacity of 10,000 tons of
            paddy and storage for 7,800 tons. The project would also
            finance the purchase of farm machinery and expansion of the
            management and extension services offered by SEMRY. A
            consulting firm would be engaged to assist in the design,
            construction, and supervision of civil works and on-farm
            development works.
